Posts.EditableText: In Jay's second reply to this thread (http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/barbvcscw02cmboewr9fnw/parser-ta-object-options) he uses {exit:roomname) as a means of creating hyperlinked exits, but when I try it it doesn't work. Does the room name have to be the main name or a unique one you manually add to the Name field on the exit?
Posts.HTML: In Jay's second reply to this thread (http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/barbvcscw02cmboewr9fnw/parser-ta-object-options) he uses {exit:roomname) as a means of creating hyperlinked exits, but when I try it it doesn't work. Does the room name have to be the main name or a unique one you manually add to the Name field on the exit?

Posts.EditableText: So K. I do indeed have to add a unique name to the exit.
Posts.HTML: So K. I do indeed have to add a unique name to the exit.
